728989f-a.title: Richmond: Hylan Boulevard - Bedford Avenue
728989f-a.text:
Hylan Boulevard, at the S.W. corner of Bedford Avenue, showing
the Boulevard Hotel. It was known as the Comollos Hotel in u917.
It previously belonged to Collett (1907 and 1898 maps).
May 26, 1935.
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONs
(2)
Another view of the hotel as seen from Midland Avenue.
May 26, 1v35.
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
728989f-a.folder: Hylan Boulevard & Bedford Avenue, Staten Island, NY
